newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Sao Paulo July unemployment at 15.7 pct - Dieese.
newsitem.headline: Sao Paulo July unemployment at 15.7 pct - Dieese.

text.p: The unemployment rate in Sao Paulo city dropped to 15.7 percent in July, down from 16.2 percent in June, the Labor Union Statistics Institute (Dieese) reported.
In a statement, Dieese said it was the first time since February that unemployment has shown a decrease.
The number of unemployed workers fell to 1.335 million in July, down from 1.385 million in June, it said.
July figures, however, rose against the same month last year when the share of unemployed workers hit 13.1 percent of the workforce, or 1.076 million workers, it added.
